data.title: William Sterling Williams, ESQ
data.meta_description: Lawyer William S. Williams West Palm Beach. Call (561) 655-1990 To Speak To One Of Our Attorneys About Your Case Now. Florida's Number One Personal Injury Firm.
data.text:
8-20-2024

Robert R.

Our experience with Lytal REITER Smith&Fronrath was that we were well represented.They were professional and very helpful as well as reassuring.They were patient with our concerns and guided us thru many decisions that were not what we were confident with.We had never been engaged in a legal matter like this and they helped bring the matter to a successful conclusion.We appreciate their efforts on our behalf Sincerely Therese & Bob Romano

7-31-2024

Fran S.

I had the pleasure of working with Bill Williams, Jo Hunerberg and Debra for my recent legal matter, and I couldn’t be more impressed with the experience. They demonstrated exceptional professionalism, expertise, and dedication during the entire process. I was actually very surprised and amazed on how fast they were to respond to any question or concern I had. I highly recommend Bill and his team to anyone in need of a skilled and compassionate legal professional. They truly went above and beyond, and I’m grateful for the excellent service and results

5-7-2024

Lori G.

Mr. Bill Williams is an excellent attorney. He is very professional, knowledgeable and responded to my questions and concerns in a prompt manner. His legal assistant Debra D’Elia and paralegal Leslie Cooper are wonderful and valuable members of the team at Lytal, Reiter, Smith, Ivey & Fronrath. I am truly grateful for all of your assistance. Thank you.

5-6-2024

Kathleen M.

I would absolutely recommend William Williams, Esq. to anyone in need of legal services. I was very fortunate to have had another attorney recommend Mr. Williams to me for my legal problem. Mr. Williams responded right away to my initial inquiry. His staff is top notch and made me feel confident that I was working with the best law firm and the best attorney. Thank you so much Mr. Williams for resolving this matter so quickly and so much better than I could have hoped for. KM

12-19-2023

Lisa F.

I am extremely pleased with how my case was handled by Mr. Williams and Ann Marie Leonardis. They were VERY professional at all times and although I had some serious personal delays in my case, they handled everything with great understanding and exponentially. I would hire this team again if needed and will highly recommend them to family and friends near and far. I appreciate ALL they have done for me in such a short time. Thank you !

12-19-2023

Bill Williams and his team have worked with me and my wife, Susan Bowick, for the past two years. He has always been personally available to answer questions and immediately responded to phone calls and emails. He is professional, experienced, and very dedicated to getting fast, fair results for his clients. We highly recommend him and the firm.

12-5-2023

Thanks to Mr. Williams and the team for successfully representing my interests. A year ago I was involved in a car accident in Miami. I was crossing a street and’s being hit by a car. I didn’t know how to act to protect my interests. Next day after hospital I met a stranger who asked what’s happened and after explanation he offered me Mr. Williams contact details. Recently I’ve got compensation. I believe that everything was done super high quality and in my interests. Highly recommend professional!

10-27-2023

Katelynne S.

Mr. Williams was amazing. They worked in a very timely manner. I couldn’t have gotten a better lawyer to represent me. I would highly recommend them.

10-26-2023

Christina C.

I had the privilege of working with Attorney Bill Williams and his law firm, and I must say, it was a remarkable experience. Mr. Williams and his team were unexpectedly communicative, which is not always the case in the legal world. Their kindness and willingness to keep me informed throughout the process were greatly appreciated. It was an absolute pleasure to have them handle my case. I wholeheartedly recommend Attorney Bill Williams to anyone in need of a good lawyer. I’d refer him over and over without hesitation. Thank you, Mr. Williams, and your fantastic team, for your outstanding service!

10-10-2023

Anonymous

Dear Bill, Debra, and Claudine, I want to thank you all for your help over the last two and a half years. You were always prompt, efficient, and courteous through a long, complicated process. I appreciate your diligence and kindness throughout. I look forward to spending most of the winter free of worry about the suit.

09-21-2023

Alicia G.

Bill Williams is an excellent attorney. He handled every detail of my case with professionalism, understanding, and integrity. He is outstanding, empathetic, and meticulous in his work. He is thoroughly connected in the community with excellent resources and doctors to ensure his clients receive the best care. He is appropriately assertive and diligent when dealing with insurance companies. He does not back down or cave into resistances or scare tactics. I would choose him every time if I ever need a personal injury attorney again in Florida. He gets 5 stars from me, but he deserves 10!

09-08-2023

William M.

I was a client of this firm From day one, they were very polite, very prompt to get back to me, extremely knowledgeable, and help me with every aspect of my case Any time that I had a question or a concern I got a very prompt response I needed surgeries and they directed me to the best doctor that I could’ve asked for I would refer this law firm anybody who ever needs assistance. Sincerely, William.

08-15-2023

Dejan B.

Thank you for all you did for me and my family, Mr.Bill Williams is a amazing person!!!

08-15-2023

Sanela B.

Thank you for everything you did for us and for our family, Mr.Bill Williams is the best attorney and the person we have met in our lives.

07-28-2023

Blanca A.

Some time ago, I had a slip and fall accident, and the law firm took my case, it was a very difficult case, but Lawyer Williams, specially, fought and fought for me to obtain a good compensation and I succeeded, I am very grateful to this law firm, and I recommend them, they are super honest and very clear in all their decisions, I wish God continues to bless them and lead them to success every day Blanca Aguiar

07-26-2023

Phil H.

My claim from an auto accident recently settled. Bill Williams handled it and was professional, aggressive and relentless. He maximized my award. He always answered my phone calls and along with Debra D’elia and Ann Marie kept me informed every step of the way. Thanks, Bill, for everything.

12-26-2022

Chris V.

I highly recommend this law firm. Excellent Lawyers. I have worked with both Bill Williams and Kevin Smith. Very responsive. Aggressive with the opposition. Understanding and compassionate with clients.

12-21-2022

Lea W.

Mr. William Williams and his staff were extremely respectful and provided extremely effective representation in my case. Throughout the course of the case Mr. Williams kept me updated with all the information and was always readily available if I needed him. You can tell that he cares about his clients and wants to get the best possible outcome he can.

12-14-2022

Deborah M.

Attorney William Williams is the best! He really cared about us to get the best result and to get it as fast as possible. His team and the firm is great too! If we need an attorney again, he is the first person we would call!

12-13-2022

Catherine B.

I am so pleased with Mr. William S. Williams my attorney who worked so diligently to settle a recent case for me. He went above and beyond and exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend him.

11-22-2022

Aaron Henderson

William Williams and the staff at Lytal, Reiter, Smith, Ivey & Fronrath were excellent and took care of my case, as well as making sure we were OK. I know there are a lot of firms out there that mention a lot of promises – promises they can’t deliver. What I wanted in my attorney was someone who would be honest with me – for good and bad – and be willing to fight for me and my family. Mr. Williams handled my case with toughness toward the other side, and always made sure to check on us to see how we were doing. I heard from his staff as well, that we got to be on a first name basis, and they were going above and beyond to help. Our case was settled a lot quicker than I thought – and I got a fair and just settlement. I know there are a lot of attorneys out there, but for my money – and it is – you could not ask for a better lawyer than William Williams. He has my full recommendation.

11-22-2022

Aaron H.

William Williams and the staff at Lytal, Reiter, Smith, Ivey & Fronrath were excellent and took care of my case, as well as making sure we were OK. I know there are a lot of firms out there that mention a lot of promises – promises they can’t deliver. What I wanted in my attorney was someone who would be honest with me – for good and bad – and be willing to fight for me and my family. Mr. Williams handled my case with toughness toward the other side, and always made sure to check on us to see how we were doing. I heard from his staff as well, that we got to be on a first name basis, and they were going above and beyond to help. Our case was settled a lot quicker than I thought – and I got a fair and just settlement. I know there are a lot of attorneys out there, but for my money – and it is – you could not ask for a better lawyer than William Williams. He has my full recommendation.

11-21-2022

Lola H.

In March of this year, I was rear ended at 40 mph, sustained 3 herniated cervical discs, neck pain, totaled car…a real life changer. Thanks to Bill Williams, and his entire staff of Lytal, Reiter, Smith, Ivey and Fronrath, they helped me through this, and settled the case. They checked on me frequently, and it was comforting to know they cared. Sincere thanks to them and Dr David Campbell, Spinal Surgery

11-7-2022

Tamille W.

Attorney Bill Williams did an excellent job of representing me. He is professional, empathetic and knowledgeable concerning the laws. I was informed of everything before a decision was made. He even took the time to call me on Sundays to assure I was feeling better.

10-28-2022

Brittney H.

William Williams has been an attorney on two of my personal injury cases. I had a very difficult case and he did such an exceptional job, exceeding my expectations. I am so thankful that I chose such an experienced attorney and very pleased with the outcome. He was always available to take my calls, answering any questions that I may have had. The amount of time, effort and professionalism that William Williams and his team has shown, is enough for you to choose him to work on your case.

9-7-2022

Al T.

Over 2 years ago, I was contemplating going through with legal action after being rear ended at a red light. For personal reasons, I decided not to go through with it. Fast forward two years, I reached out to bill after experiencing continued complications from the accident. He immediately remembered me and assured me he and his team would do everything they could to help me out the best they could. Ann Marie was my paralegal and any question I had no matter the time of day, she would respond in minutes. Bill and his team are the best there is and I’m very lucky to have had them in my corner. Highly recommended!

4-27-2022

Janine M.

The group at Lytal Reiter law firm truly went above and beyond in handling my personal injury claim. They diligently explained every situation in detail to me and answered all of my questions. I had the pleasure of dealing with Mr. William S. Williams and his personal legal assistant Debra who from the very start, was upfront and realistic regarding the situation and expectations. In the end he maximized my claim, for which I am very grateful. I was very fortunate to fall into the care of the Lytal Reiter law firm group, and I would highly recommend them to anyone in need of a law firm to handle a personal injury matter.

March 31, 2022

Ernest W.

I was treated with great concern for my health before business. I definitely felt the true concern from everyone I spoke with. Bill was great to talk to and very knowledgeable. I really felt that my fight was his fight, and they took all the issues and concerns I had with the insurance company and addressed them for me. Bill was recommended to me and now I will recommend him to everyone I known if in need. I suggest anyone reading this to also give them a call if you need someone to represent you. Thank you again Bill!

March 29, 2022

Anonymous

This lawyer is top notch professional he knows what he is doing. Thank you again Mr. Williams.

Cheryl Snyder

March 29, 2022

I feel Mr. Williams was on top of my case right along and I was pleased with the service I received from him.

March 29, 2022

Louie C.

Mr. Williams and the firm are very client oriented. They will work to get you the best results possible.

March 29, 2022

Suzanne G.

Bill Williams and his team at Lytal Reiter are the very best both compassionate and professional – I highly recommend them for all your needs!

Nov 13, 2021

Gennaro A.

There is no doubt that I made the right choice when hiring Mr. Bill Williams to handle a legal matter for me. Mr. Williams and his team guided me throughout the entire process, always responding quickly to any question and checking in on me frequently. Bill is dedicated to serving his clients the best he can and he’s results speak for themselves. As a young man, Mr. Williams is someone to look up too because of his great work ethic, strong morals, and the compassion he treats his clients with. I highly recommend working with Bill and his great team as I have had a wonderful experience

Nov 11, 2021

Lori G.

I would like to take this opportunity to thank Mr. William S. Williams and his entire staff for assisting me in my recent case. Mr. Williams was always available to answer my questions and explain things to me. In addition, his knowledge, experience, courtesy, and professionalism are some of the many reasons I will always be grateful to him for the way my case was handled. I highly recommend him if you are ever involved in an accident and need a personal injury attorney.

Nov 8, 2021

Anonymous

I am so grateful for Mr. Williams’ help!! Both he and his team were always super quick to respond to my questions and really made me feel that I was in the best hands possible. Can’t thank them enough for all they did to help me.

Nov 5, 2021

Shelby Mahon

Attorney William “Bill” Williams recently represented my husband and myself in a civil trail and won. We are overjoyed with the results that Mr. Williams got for us. He is a five star plus attorney, and we highly recommend him. Thank you again, Mr. Williams.

Nov 3, 2021

Anonymous

I can’t thank Mr. Williams enough for representing me in my case. His work ethic and professionalism reflect well in his successful career, and I had no doubts in his ability when working with me. He is extremely communicative and maintains a highly ethical practice. My respect for Mr. Williams has grown exponentially, even after 20 years, and I can’t recommend him enough.

October 22, 2021

Dimitri K.

Mr. Williams and his staff handled my case with unwavering dedication and commitment. Him and his staff were always available to answer questions and were absolutely critical in reaching a timely and appropriate resolution.

Aug 1, 2021

Joe S.

I would like to take the time to express how happy I was to have worked with Mr. Bill Williams and his staff. They were very professional and if I needed anything or had any questions, they were there to answer them all. He always checked up on me and made sure I was ok as if he knew me for years. He treated me like family, and I would highly recommend Mr. Williams and his team knowing they have only your best interest at heart. Thank you’ll again for such great service.

Jun 7, 2021

Jessica G.

Bill Williams was extremely professional and communicative. He was always available to take my calls or quick to respond to my emails with my concerns regarding my case. Bill and his team worked efficiently and diligently to ensure that I was compensated appropriately. I would highly recommend him to anyone dealing with personal injury.

April 22, 2021

Lottie S.

This is a great Law Firm. My Attorney was William. S. Williams, Esq. and his legal Assistants, Jo Hunerberg and Claudine Tollinger. They were very professional, kept me updated on my case from start to finish. They definitely love their profession, and it shows in their handling of a case. I certainly dealt with the “A-Team” not to mention “Dream Team”, and I want to say “Thank you”. Great Job.

April 14, 2021

Tracey S.

Great experience! My attorney, Bill Williams and his paralegal Amarys are awesome! They always keep me informed and always go the extra mile. I highly recommend them and will continue to retain them for all my legal matters because I know I am in good hands. Thank you, Attorney Bill Williams and Amarys, for all that you do!

April 7, 2021

Lottie S.

This is the most wonderful law firm. Mr. Williams was my Attorney and his

legal Assistant “Emilia” Jo Hunerberg. were absolutely outstanding. they handled my case with the Insurance Company very efficiently, and I am grateful to both. Phone calls were returned promptly, and my case was handled very satisfactorily. Again, thank you to Mr. Williams and Ms. Hunerberg.

March 29, 2021

Alianet C.

I had the best experience with Mr. William Williams and his whole team, very professional, great communication throughout the process. Huge thank to Amarys Reyes and Regan Navarro they were exceptional. I would highly recommend Mr. William Williams and his staff.

March 17, 2021

Joseph M.

I was in an accident. I got a call from the insurance agency from the person that hit me. They wanted me to sign a document and I felt really under a lot of pressure from them. They offered me an amount of money that really did not even cover the repairs to my truck. So, I reached out to Lytal Reiter and was connected with Bill Williams. From the start I knew I made the right choice in calling them. The entire team worked diligently to let me understand my rights and that I did not have to settle for what the insurance company was offering. During the entire process, they kept me informed of what was happening and I never felt in the dark with my case. When it was all over, I received a settlement that covered repairs, medical expenses and money I lost in time I could not work. I don’t plan on getting into another accident anytime soon, but if I do or any of my friends do, I am calling Bill and the folks at Lytal Reiter! Great people!

March 3, 2021

Israel S.

After an auto accident William “Bill” Williams was recommended to me by another attorney in Boca Raton. Bill worked very diligently on my case and was very sincere and caring. His paralegal Amarys Reyes continually stayed in touch with me keeping me up to date. This firm is perhaps one of the best in the country. I now have another case and am using attorney Gabriel Isasi V and have had the same level of communication.

Feb 24, 2021

Anonymous

Bill Williams and his assistant Amarys Reyes did an excellent job representing me in my recent personal injury lawsuit. The case involved a car striking me in the bike lane while riding my bike along A1A in Lake Worth. The case was complicated by the fact we could not determine the true identity of the driver, but we had a positive identification of the owner of the vehicle. Bill determined the best way to proceed was against the owner of the vehicle. With their meetings with the insurance company representing the owner, filling all the detailed paperwork and negotiating settlement with the car owner’s insurance company we arrived at a favorable outcome. I highly recommend them.

Feb 3, 2021

Joel M.

Bill Williams handled my case. It was very complex, involved a lot of insurance companies and was complicated by no eyewitnesses and an inaccurate police report. His investigator Jimmie came to the accident scene with me, and his detailed investigation and analysis were very helpful in convincing the insurance companies to pay all I was due. One company disputed I was working because I was going between projects on my Harley. Bill got this shot down very quickly. All the insurance companies finally paid the maximum amounts; Bill’s work allowed me to pay all my bills, live well and keep my company running and my workers employed. His fee for all this work was very fair. If you have a difficult and complex case or any serious injury this is the attorney and firm to retain. Bill reviewed all my insurance and found benefits I did not even know I was entitled to for this accident. They were very helpful and knowledge when I was interviewed by insurance company investigators. Do not deal with an insurance company without Bill. At the end of the day Bill and Jimmie got me a fair and proper settlement with all companies. I can tell you without them I would not have had a chance. When ads for the firm are on TV and feature Bill, I am always proud to say he was my attorney. I recommend him to those in need of a fair shake on an accident. He still sends me a card on my birthday and at Christmas. Just a great friend now and a really, really good attorney. You can take it to the bank with Bill and he will see that the insurance companies treat you fairly. They all settled out of court. This is a testament to his ability.

Feb 3, 2021

Sarah P.

Mr. Williams is an excellent attorney. Very punctual and friendly. Always available any time you call him. His staff is just as wonderful. He did an excellent job with my case. Quickly handled my case to make sure I deserved what was necessary for my recovery and with the losses I incurred. Highly recommend him and staff.

Feb 2, 2021

Amy G.

The day of a car crash is never a good day but with the expertise of Bill Williams, esquire better days lie ahead. The injuries sustained combined with financial difficulties makes for an overwhelming situation. Mr. Williams offers guidance and support that helps to create an intelligent plan of litigation. He is most accessible and always willing to go the extra mile to resolve any issue. The firm of Lytal, Reiter, et al has our strongest endorsement.

Feb 1, 2021

Juliana C.

I have used Bill Williams twice when in a car accident that wasn’t my fault.

Bill stepped in right away to help me, when I didn’t know what the next steps were for seeking medical care. He was able to get all my medical expenses covered as well additional money to pay for my continued care. He also called and checked on me personally once a week and made sure if I had any questions or needed anything. I would highly recommend Bill Williams.

Jan 23, 2021

Patricia J.

Mr. Bill Williams was our attorney when my husband had a car accident. He is extremely knowledgeable and conscientious. Always kept us informed. We had a quick settlement thanks to his wonderful work ethic. His staff is always friendly and ready to help in anyway. I can’t thank him enough for helping us thru this trying time!

Jan 21, 2021

Rachel M.

This firm is extremely professional, and Mr. William Williams (Bill) comes with my highest recommendation. He gave me his personal cell phone number and told me I could call anytime. He was very responsive to all of my needs. In a time very difficult to me, he provided me with service that surpassed my expectations. He gave me hope in a time of turmoil. He has a very direct and no-nonsense approach and there is no sugar-coating; this realistic and honest approach was much appreciated. This is a person you definitely want on your side. I did not know who to turn to when I found out I was in need of an attorney. I had the good fortune of a personal recommendation to call Bill. I am so happy to have had that recommendation and now I can tell you from my own experience that if you are in South Florida and are in need of an attorney with Mr. Williams practicing specialty, then he is the person you need representing you. Thank you for all you did to help me Mr. Williams!

Nov 16, 2020

Peter M.

I was involved in a rear end collision which sustained me injuries to my neck and lower back. The initial attorney dropped the ball in filing timely which voided the case. I went to seek new counsel with the Lytal firm and employed Atty. William Williams. Thanks to him and Amarys Reyes, the case was reinstated, and I received the compensation due me. I would always trust and call upon them for any legal issues.

October 20, 2020

Lavonna R.

I can’t thank Bill Williams enough for the exceptional outcome on my case. He went above and beyond and superseded my expectations on my settlement. Excellent communication, professional, knowledgeable, prompt on returning my calls and emails, compassionate, caring and very dedicated. Bill Williams is an amazing attorney!! He made a huge impact on my life, and I will forever be grateful! He worked endless hours AND weekends, in order to get my case settled as soon as possible. Thank you to the paralegals and especially Reagan Navarro! The firm is very lucky to have someone like you working for them. You’re very pleasant, knowledgeable, organized, and able to multitask. Very impressive! Great teamwork!!! I would highly recommend Bill Williams!

Aug 3, 2020

Robert C.

Bill Williams brought my litigation with a municipality to a successful conclusion. I appreciate the hard work and professionalism he and his staff brought to this case. Mr. Williams is like a bulldog. HE gets results. I highly recommend him and his firm.

July 27, 2020

Payne M.

Amazing service they provide, specifically from Bill Williams and his daily effort to get me what I deserved. His communication was unbelievable, and I could not have been more happy with the settlement. I would recommend him to anyone seeking a personal injury lawyer and couldn’t be more thankful. 5 Stars

Sep 7, 2018

Jen J.

Bill Williams and Amarys were instrumental in not only negotiating a large settlement, but also in coaching me through the challenging process of accident litigation in Florida. They were gentle, encouraging and patient with me, thoroughly professional and personable. You want these folks representing you – not just for the win, but to help make this unpleasant process easier.

June 21, 2018

Elizabeth P.

My case was handled by Bill Williams and Amarys Reyes. It is hard to express how incredibly appreciative I am of their work. Since the man who hit me had so little insurance, I faced the possibility of being in debt from the accident that severely injured me. But they worked so hard to advocate for me that I am not in debt and was able to receive enough money from the settlement to take care of myself while I continue rehabilitation. They have been instrumental in making my recovery possible.

June 5, 2017

Deardra K.

I was referred by a dear friend to attorney Bill Williams office for a first-time experience after having a car accident. The professionalism of Mr. Williams and staff, Amarys Reyes was very helpful as they both kept me up to speed on all details, questions and returns my calls and emails in a timely manner. The process was very smooth, and they made my experience comforting. I will be recommending the offices of Lytal, Reiter. .. to anyone in need of legal counsel for the services they provide.

Feb 11, 2017

Jim B.

William Williams and his team made this whole process effortless for me. They explained each process clearly and the professionalism of the entire firm was amazing. I would highly recommend William and his team to my friends, family and colleagues.

April 6, 2016

Anonymous

Excellent communication, honesty and integrity by our attorney Mr. Bill Williams and paralegal Amarys Reyes. Always available. Excellent guidance. Very happy with our choice and would highly recommend this law firm to anyone needing legal guidance.
